title: The warmest cities in South America
summary: The warmest City in South America is Belem at 36 degress , next is Montevideo at 29 degress , then Lima at 25 degrees , Cordoba is 23 degress , Santiago is 20 degress and last is Bogota at 16 degrees .
gold: The chart shows the temperature in six cities in South America . Belem is the warmest at just above 35 C . This is followed by Montevideo at just under 30 C .
